title: 急需！1.8.7，mac os系统。
author: ssy2014
txt_content: 如题。mac系统。1.8.7.希望是百度云

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
ssy2014 发表于 2015-7-23 10:21
MAC无法用 .
这么来说多数整合包都是为Windows系统的，Mac非常少
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dDBxTLn#path=%252FHelloMinecraft!Launcher(%25E8%25AF%25B7%25E6%2589%2593%25E5%25BC%2580%25E6%2596%2587%25E4%25BB%25B6%25E5%25A4%25B9)%252F%25E9%2580%259A%25E7%2594%25A8%2520MacOSX%25E8%258B%25B9%25E6%259E%259C%25E7%25B3%25BB%25E7%25BB%259F%2520Ubuntu%2520Fedora(Jar%25E5%258C%2585)
你还是直接下载这个吧...点开就能自动安装，
然后到http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... dertype=1#pid547863下载1.8.7版本的assets、libraries与versions文件夹，放到.minecraft里面就可以了
